Package model.element.card

Class MovementCard

java.lang.Object
boardifier.model.GameElement
model.element.card.MovementCard
public class MovementCard extends GameElement
Represents a movement card in the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • MovementCard

      public MovementCard(int step, MovementCard.Direction direction, GameStageModel gameStageModel)
      Constructs a new movement card with the specified step, direction, and game stage model.
      Parameters:
      step - The step of the movement card.
      direction - The direction of the movement card.
      gameStageModel - The game stage model to which this movement card belongs.
